newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH CENTRAL BANK 2-WEEK REV REPO YIELD 16.0 PCT.
newsitem.headline: CZECH CENTRAL BANK 2-WEEK REV REPO YIELD 16.0 PCT.

text.p: The average yield in a Czech National Bank (CNB) two-week reverse repo tender draining liquidity reached the limit yield of 16.0 percent, the CNB said on Monday.

The CNB said it accepted all bids at that level. The yield was the same as in a similar tender on July 16. The two-week Prague interbank offered rate ranged around 17.20 percent in morning trading on Wednesday.
Earlier on Monday, the central bank drained one-week funds, also at 16.0 percent.
